mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hdg_battery_cell_barcode WHERE cell_format_id = #{cellFormatId} ORDER BY id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hdg_battery_cell_barcode( cell_format_id, cell_mfr, cell_model, barcode, operator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{cellFormatId}, #{cellMfr}, #{cellModel}, #{barcode}, #{operator}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update hdg_battery_cell_barcode set cell_format_id = #{cellFormatId}, cell_mfr = #{cellMfr}, cell_model = #{cellModel}, barcode = #{barcode}, operator = #{operator} where id = #{id}
